Current environment: -= Kitchen =- Well, here we are in the kitchen. Hey, want to see a fridge? Look over there, a fridge. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best? You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see an oven. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now. You can make out a table. But there isn't a thing on it. You can make out a counter. The counter is vast. On the counter you can make out a red hot pepper, a red apple, a yellow bell pepper, a cookbook and a knife. You can see a stove. The stove is conventional. The stove appears to be empty. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?
